#nametype [nametype]: 143
The Nemedians have merged the old magical traditions of their Partholonian ancestors and the magic of their Fomorian masters. Sorceresses skilled in Death and Air magic hide in the dark spires of Rath Chimbaith where they summon whispering shades of mist and darkness.
